process.name: Test MTE Deleting Within Group Inheritance

subsheet.name: Deleting a process group from inside a restricted group (With Manage Access Rights)
Deleting an object group from inside a restricted group (With Manage Access Rights)
Deleting a process group from inside a restricted group (Without Manage Access Rights)
Deleting an object group from inside a restricted group (Without Manage Access Rights)

stage.name: Deleting a process group from inside a restricted group (With Manage Access Rights)
Note1
stage.narrative: GIVEN I have the required process and object folder structure in place with the relivent permissions restricted.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN im using a user with 'Manage Access Rights' AND I delete a sub-group from a restricted group
THEN the group is deleted AND the process is moved upto the parent group

stage.name: Deleting an object group from inside a restricted group (With Manage Access Rights)
Deleting a process group from inside a restricted group (Without Manage Access Rights)
Deleting an object group from inside a restricted group (Without Manage Access Rights)
Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN im using a user with 'Manage Access Rights' AND I delete a sub-group from a restricted group
THEN the group is deleted AND the object is moved upto the parent group

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: Set Role Permissions
input.narrative: Collection with users and permissions to be set

input.name: Negative Test?
input.narrative: flag to change the flow so a user can attempt to set permissions when folder is not restritcted

output.name: Permissions Set?
output.narrative: Flag to indicate if permissions have been set

resource.action: Manage Access Rights Set Individual Permissions - Process

input.name: Set Role Permissions
input.narrative: Collection with users and permissions to be set

input.name: Negative Test?
input.narrative: flag to change the flow so a user can attempt to set permissions when folder is not restritcted

output.name: Permissions Set?
output.narrative: Flag to indicate if permissions have been set

resource.action: Manage Access Rights Set Individual Permissions - Object

input.name: Target Element
input.narrative: Element (Process/object/group) to display current Access rights

input.name: Nested?
input.narrative: Set flag if element is contained within another element

input.name: Nesting Structure
input.narrative: Provide a colleciton of parent elements to expand nodes

output.name: Access Rights Screen loaded
output.narrative: Flag set to true if screen successfully loaded

input.name: Target Element
input.narrative: Element (Process/object/group) to display current Access rights

input.name: Nested?
input.narrative: Set flag if element is contained within another element

input.name: Nesting Structure
input.narrative: Provide a colleciton of parent elements to expand nodes

output.name: Access Rights Screen loaded
output.narrative: Flag set to true if screen successfully loaded

input.name: Username
input.narrative: The username of the user you wish to create.

input.name: Password
input.narrative: The password in which you want to assign to the user.

input.name: User Expiry Date
input.narrative: The date in which the user account will expire.

input.name: Password Expiry Date
input.narrative: The date in which the password will expire.

input.name: Roles
input.narrative: The roles you wish to give to your user.

input.name: Password Duration
input.narrative: The duration, in weeks you wish the password to last before expiring.

input.name: New Role Name
input.narrative: Name of the new Role

input.name: Parent Node Name
input.narrative: Name of the Parent Node to check or uncheck.

input.name: Check?
input.narrative: True if item needs to be checked. False to Uncheck the item.

resource.action: User Roles - Check/Uncheck Permissions Parent Node

input.name: Parent Node Name
input.narrative: Name of the Parent Node to check or uncheck.

input.name: Check?
input.narrative: True if item needs to be checked. False to Uncheck the item.

resource.action: User Roles - Check/Uncheck Permissions Parent Node

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

WHEN im using a user without 'Manage Access Rights' AND I delete a sub-group from a restricted group

THEN the group is deleted AND the object is moved upto the parent group

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Group Name
input.narrative: The name of the group you want to delete.

input.name: Match Index
input.narrative: If the group exists more than once this is a way to target a specific one.

stage.name: Check Process still in Sub Sub Group

input.name: Group to check
input.narrative: Group containing expected moved group/process/object

input.name: Element to check
input.narrative: Group/Process/Object expected

input.name: Index Value
input.narrative: (for default groups, 1 for process 2 for object)

exception.detail: "The process was meant to be moved up a level when the child group was deleted, however it can't be found in the parent group."

input.name: Group to check
input.narrative: Group containing expected moved group/process/object

input.name: Element to check
input.narrative: Group/Process/Object expected

input.name: Index Value
input.narrative: (for default groups, 1 for process 2 for object)

stage.name: Sub Sub Group in correct place?

exception.detail: "The sub sub group was meant to be moved up a level when the parent group was deleted, however it can't be found in the parent group."
